content.content: Updated GovAlpha Multisig As per MIP47, GovAlpha is posting an update to our Multisig. Most information is the same, the notable difference being that @LongForWisdom 's signing address has been replaced with @Patrick_J’s. Here is the transaction adding @Patrick_J and here is the transaction removing @LongForWisdom. Besides that, and transfering the point of contact to @prose11, all other aspects of the GovAlpha Multisig remain the same. A ledger spreadsheet for all our transactions is available here, and tends to accurate within a day of the most recent transactions. Multi-sig Address: 0x01D26f8c5cC009868A4BF66E268c17B057fF7A73 Keyholders:   @prose11 : 0xf3ED2bdeBa77940E6759B806cd55CE20cAE369BE  @Patrick_J : 0x06ADa798f9323392cA30C755383Af879bd853168  Per MIP47c1:   Governance must be able to revoke funding and permissions from approved multi-sigs at any time.   You can check the spending limit section here. The DSPauseProxy Contract is allowed up to 1B DAI.   Signatory requirements providing no less than ⅔ of listed signatories to sign off on an action.   It’s a 2 of 2 mult-sig currently, with @prose11 and @Patrick_J  as keyholders.  All signers must be tagged on the forum and their willingness to be included in the Multi-Sig publicly confirmed.  Confirmed.  A representative for the Multi-Sig must be designated as an official point of contact.  @prose11  is the primary contact.  There must be a clear and public explanation of the purpose and scope of the Multi-Sig.  Administering funds designated by Maker Governance to be spent to achieve the GovAlpha Core Unit mandate.  A clearly defined process for onboarding and offboarding signatories.  Facilitators of GovAlpha will be added as keyholders to this multi-sig. Signatory requirements will be adjusted as necessary to maintain 2/3rd signers wherever possible. In certain circumstances members of GovAlpha may be added as keyholders at the existing facilitators discretion to maintain an adequate level of security for administered funds.   A wallet address to be whitelisted.   0x01D26f8c5cC009868A4BF66E268c17B057fF7A73  Following an approved Governance action that involves a newly recognized Multi-Sig, the information provided will be added to a list of recognized Multi-Sig Wallets.  @MIP-Editors update the MIP47 list when appropriate.
prose11:  @Patrick_J : 0x06ADa798f9323392cA30C755383Af879bd853168   I confirm I am the owner of this address. Verification.
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
